alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 30 at 3:44AM EST until December 01 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 - 50 mph. * WHERE...Hamilton County. * WHEN...From this evening through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest accumulations will be in western Hamilton County. Experimental content below...do not use operationally. To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4376 7455 4377 7467 4381 7466 4385 7478 4387 7498 4384 7514 4365 7512 4360 7486 4367 7475 4368 7463 TIME Y22M12D01T0000Z-Y22M12D01T1200Z COORD...4346 7483 4354 7490 4363 7497 4357 7498 4353 7508 4343 7511 4336 7506 4332 7489 4332 7477 4343 7473 TIME Y22M12D01T1200Z-Y22M12D02T0000Z
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
